name: Castlemancer
storyline: You are the archmage of renowned magical academy Castle Conjure. Castle Conjure houses a unique magical essence at its heart, which attracts wizarding students from across the land. This power has also caught the eye of less-than-heroic leaders who want to take advantage of Castle Conjure's hidden secrets!
summary: How long can you last in this survival roguelite deckbuilder? Play cards to manage castle resources, defeat invaders, and damage the enemy army. Make difficult choices, cast powerful spells, and weather the siege!

videos.name: Dev Diary
videos.title: The BIG Problem With Game Development | Devlog
